column12: epoll<ref name="epoll">epoll. xmailserver.org. (Linux since 2.6) - I/O event notification facility. Has a much better performance than select() and poll() system calls.</ref>
column13: kqueue<ref name="kqueue">kqueue (FreeBSD since 4.1) - asynchronous event dispatch mechanism.</ref>
column15: RT signals<ref name="rtsigio">"POSIX.4 Real Time Signals" (Linux since 2.4) - special class of Linux system signals used for notification of events on file descriptors. Deprecated in favour of epoll.</ref>
column17: Windows IOCP<ref>"CreateIoCompletionPort function". Microsoft MSDN Library.</ref>
column18: Solaris IOCP<ref>"The Event Completion Framework for the Solaris Operating System (Solaris IOCP)". Sun.com.</ref>
